```{r}
library(shiny)
library(Seurat)
library(ShinyCell)
```

```{r}
data.combined <- readRDS("/RDS/data_umap_10_clusters.RDS")
scConf = createConfig(data.combined)
data.combined <- JoinLayers(data.combined)
makeShinyApp(data.combined, scConf, gene.mapping = TRUE,
             shiny.title =  "Clustered Data")
```
